question: 大失敗
sourceMnemonic: You know how <ja>失敗</ja> is a mistake? Well, a <kanji>large</kanji> <kanji>mistake</kanji> is going to be a <vocabulary>total failure</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>huge mistake</vocabulary>. So terrible!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. It will help to know <ja>失敗</ja> on its own as well.
